job.description:
{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-08-19T17:24:00.000Z", "description": "

Modis is currently looking for a Data Scientist for a exciting opportunity in Michigan (remote to start)! This will be working in a fast paced enterprise environment, working with large data sets, and doing heavy modeling. The ideal candidate would have of 3+ years of data science experience, have worked with customer insight analytics, and has worked on new model development utilizing Python and R.


POSITION DESCRIPTION 

  • Build large-scale machine-learning models/pipelines
  • Maintain and enhance operational models through their lifecycle.
  • Developing metrics and reports to monitor model accuracy and evaluate performance
  • Translate complex quantitative analysis into business insights.
  • Collect data, perform statistical analysis, and present solutions to Product Owners/business customers.
  • Works hands on with tools such as Python, R, and SQL.
  • Define and create the next generation of data solutions.


TECHNICAL SKILLS DESIRED

  • 3 - 5 years of Data Science experience 
  • Predictive Modelling
  • Statistical analysis
  • Python
  • R
  • SQL
  • Bachelor\u2019s degree in mathematics, data science, statistics, or computer science
  • Experience with GCP is a plus!


ADDITIONAL INFORMATION

  • Excellent compensation packages including Subsidized Medical Benefits, Paid Time Off and 401k
  • No Third-Party inquiries
  • This role can be remote to start - but will eventually need to be onsite in Michigan!
